name: National Multiple Schlerosis Society
description: MS Society helps people affected by Multiple Sclerosis (MS) in the Northern California area address the challenges of living with MS. MS Society provides educational programs, peer counseling, support groups, financial and respite assistance, and referrals to medical professionals. Call 1(800) 344-4867. MS Navigators are available Monday - Friday, 9AM - 7PM ET or fill out this form: https://www.nationalmssociety.org/Helpful-Links/Contact-Us
